#summary How to download ConnId artifacts (server, bundles, ...)

= Downloads =

The standard way to get !ConnId artifacts is by Maven dependency handling features.

However, you can also get all artifacts at the following locations:
 * [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/connid Stable releases]
 * [http://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/org/connid/ Snapshot releases]
